questions: What is your name and where are you from?
Describe your family.
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
Tell me about your favorite color.
What is your favorite food? Why?
Describe your house or apartment.
Tell me about your best friend.
What time do you usually wake up?
What is your favorite animal?
Describe what you usually do on weekends.
What do you usually wear to school or work?
What do you usually drink during the day?
What is your favorite season? Why?
Tell me about a place you like to visit in your town.
What do you usually do after school or work?
Describe your favorite holiday or festival.
Who cooks in your family?
Do you like sports? Which ones?
What is your favorite hobby?
What is the weather like today?
What’s in your bag or backpack right now?
What is your favorite subject at school?
What do you do when you are happy?
What’s your favorite drink?
tips: Speak clearly and for about 60 seconds.
